name: BINGO (Europe Tour)
description:
Welcome To Europe!! Playing your favorite game...BINGO!!

Traditional BINGO with a twist. Play one or multiple cards, the more coins you earn, the more of Europe you'll get to see.

London
Moscow
Paris
Prague
Nice
Pisa and MORE!!

Challenge your friends or online players in the Game Center.

We've unlock most levels for non-stop game play and that equals non-stop fun!

Play BINGO (Europe Tour) today!!
